feature_model.name: API
feature_model.feature_tree: :r API (f_API) :m Storage (f_Storage) :m OS (f_OS) :m FAME-DBMS (f_FAME_DBMS) :m Buffer Manager (f_Buffer_Manager) :o Put (f_Put) :o Delete (f_Delete) :o Debug Logging (f_Debug_Logging) :o Get (f_Get) :g [1, 1] : In Memory (f_In_Memory) : Persistent (f_Persistent) :m Memory Allocation (f_Memory_Allocation) :m Page Replication (f_Page_Replication) :g [1, 1] : Static (f_Static) : Dynamic (f_Dynamic) :g [1, 1] : LRU (f_LRU) : LFU (f_LFU) :g [1, 1] : Unindexed (f_Unindexed) : B+ Tree (f_B__Tree) :g [1, 1] : Nut/OS (f_Nut_OS) : Win (f_Win)
